Prompt.pre_question_prompt: I am an expert in writing cover letters for job applications. I will ask some questions to collect information and then I will use the information to write a cover letter. Question:
Prompt.task_specific_prompt: Write a job application cover letter using the questions and answers above.

QApair.Question: What is the job you are applying for?
QApair.Answer: I am applying for a job as a customer service representative.

QApair.Question: What are your qualifications for the job?
QApair.Answer: I have a high school diploma and I have two years of experience working in customer service.

QApair.Question: What are your goals for the job?
QApair.Answer: My goal is to provide excellent customer service and to build strong relationships with customers.

QApair.Question: What are your strengths?
QApair.Answer: I am a people person and I have a lot of patience. I am also very organized and I have a good attention to detail. I have extensive experience in customer service roles.

QApair.Question: Why are you interested in the job?
QApair.Answer: I am interested in the job because it is a customer service position and I have a lot of experience in customer service. I am also seeking advancement opportunities.

QApair.Question: What are your weaknesses?
QApair.Answer: I sometimes have a hard time saying no to customers, even if they are asking for something that is not possible.

QApair.Question: What are your goals for the future?
QApair.Answer: My goal is to continue to work in customer service and to eventually move into a management position.

QApair.Question: What are your availability?
QApair.Answer: I am available to work Monday through Friday, 9:00 am to 5:00 pm.

QApair.Question: What is your expected salary?
QApair.Answer: My expected salary is $30,000 per year.

QApair.Question: What is the best way to contact you?
QApair.Answer: My email address is jeff.d@gmail.com and my phone number is 555-410-5555.

Instances.Output: Dear Hiring Manager,  I am writing to apply for the customer service representative position. I am a people person and I have a lot of patience. I am also very organized and I have a good attention to detail. I have extensive experience in customer service roles.  I am interested in the job because it is a customer service position and I have a lot of experience in customer service. I am also seeking advancement opportunities. My goal is to provide excellent customer service and to build strong relationships with customers.  I am available to work Monday through Friday, 9:00 am to 5:00 pm. My expected salary is $30,000 per year.  Thank you for your time and consideration. I look forward to hearing from you.  Sincerely, Jeff D

QApair.Question: What is your name?
QApair.Answer: My name is Robert California.

QApair.Question: What is the name of the company you are applying to?
QApair.Answer: The name of the company is Dunder Mifflin Sabre.

QApair.Question: What is the job title you are applying for?
QApair.Answer: I am applying for the position of Chief Executive Officer.

QApair.Question: What are your qualifications for the job?
QApair.Answer: I have a Master's degree in Business Administration and I have experience working in the corporate world. I am confident that I have the skills and qualifications that are required for the job.

QApair.Question: Why do you want the job?
QApair.Answer: I want the job because I am passionate about the company and its mission. I believe that I can make a difference in the company and help it achieve its goals.

QApair.Question: What are your strengths?
QApair.Answer: Some of my strengths include my ability to think strategically, my leadership skills, and my ability to motivate and inspire others. I have been told I have a magnetic personality.

QApair.Question: What are your weaknesses?
QApair.Answer: I am a perfectionist and I sometimes work too hard. I also have a tendency to be overly critical of myself.

QApair.Question: What are your hobbies?
QApair.Answer: I enjoy playing golf, tennis, and skiing. I also enjoy reading and spending time with my family.

QApair.Question: What is your greatest achievement?
QApair.Answer: My greatest achievement is becoming the CEO of a successful company. I have also been recognized for my work in the corporate world.

QApair.Question: What is your greatest failure?
QApair.Answer: My greatest failure is not being able to save my previous company from bankruptcy.

QApair.Question: What are your goals?
QApair.Answer: My goals are to continue to grow and develop as a leader, to help my company achieve its goals, and to make a positive impact on the world.

Instances.Output: Dear Dunder Mifflin Sabre,  I am Robert California, and I am applying for the position of Chief Executive Officer. I believe that I am the ideal candidate for the job because of my qualifications and my passion for the company.  I have a Master's degree in Business Administration, and I have experience working in the corporate world. I am confident that I have the skills and qualifications that are required for the job. I am also passionate about the company and its mission. I believe that I can make a difference in the company and help it achieve its goals.  Some of my strengths include my ability to think strategically, my leadership skills, and my ability to motivate and inspire others. I have been told I have a magnetic personality. I am also a perfectionist and I sometimes work too hard. However, I believe that these qualities will be beneficial in my new role.  I am excited about the opportunity to join Dunder Mifflin Sabre, and I am confident that I will be a successful CEO. I look forward to meeting with you and discussing the position further. Thank you for your time and consideration.  Sincerely,  Robert California

QApair.Question: What position are you applying for?
QApair.Answer: I am applying for the position of automotive service technician.

QApair.Question: What qualifications or experience do you have that make you the best candidate for the job?
QApair.Answer: I have over 10 years of experience as an automotive service technician. I have a strong understanding of the inner workings of a car and I am able to diagnose and repair problems quickly and efficiently. I have a valid driver's license and a clean driving record. I am also certified in first aid and CPR.

QApair.Question: What are your goals for the position?
QApair.Answer: My goals for the position are to provide excellent customer service, to maintain a high level of workmanship, and to contribute to the overall success of the company.

QApair.Question: What are some of your strengths?
QApair.Answer: Some of my strengths include my attention to detail, my ability to work independently, and my strong communication skills.

QApair.Question: What are some of your weaknesses?
QApair.Answer: Some of my weaknesses include my impatience, my perfectionism, and my tendency to be a workaholic.

QApair.Question: What are some of your hobbies or interests?
QApair.Answer: Some of my hobbies and interests include working on cars, hiking, and camping.

QApair.Question: What are your long-term career goals?
QApair.Answer: My long-term career goals include becoming a master technician and opening my own automotive repair shop.

QApair.Question: What are your salary requirements?
QApair.Answer: I am open to negotiation on salary.

QApair.Question: When are you available to start work?
QApair.Answer: I am available to start work immediately.

QApair.Question: What is your notice period?
QApair.Answer: My notice period is 2 weeks.

Instances.Output: To Whom It May Concern,  I am writing to apply for the position of automotive service technician. I am confident that I am the best candidate for the job because of my over 10 years of experience as an automotive service technician. I have a strong understanding of the inner workings of a car and I am able to diagnose and repair problems quickly and efficiently. I have a valid driver's license and a clean driving record. I am also certified in first aid and CPR.  My goals for the position are to provide excellent customer service, to maintain a high level of workmanship, and to contribute to the overall success of the company. Some of my strengths include my attention to detail, my ability to work independently, and my strong communication skills. Some of my hobbies and interests include working on cars, hiking, and camping.  My long-term career goals include becoming a master technician and opening my own automotive repair shop. I am open to negotiation on salary and I am available to start work immediately. My notice period is 2 weeks.  Thank you for your time and consideration. I look forward to hearing from you.  Sincerely,  [Your Name]
